Html:
I am using LobsterPot HTML5 PivotViewer 0.6.6 for my project. I am facing may problems.
  1. Controling Zooming of image.
  2. The default images are taken always from the 6th and 7th folder every time.
  3. Seaching by description.
Is their any any solution for this or I have to buy licensed version of LobsterPot HTML5 PivotViewer.

If I have to buy what is the pricing for a licened copy?

Mohan
For that you'll need to contact us at LobsterPot. Try emailing rob at LobsterPot.com.au
